participant_1.background:
I enjoy picking wild strawberries with my son on our weekend camping trips.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.
i used to wear a cape.
my guilty pleasure is mcdonald.

participant_2.background:
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.
my hair is very long.
I sometimes drink too much wine when I go on wine tours.
i love hiking and staying fit.

content.text: Hello to you as well.  It's going good.  How about yourself?
Pretty good, thanks.  Just had a great weekend camping with my son.
That sounds really fun!  I love camping too.  Where did you go camping?
We went to a state park about an hour away from our house.  It was really beautiful there.
That's awesome!  I'm glad you had a great time.  I'm sure your son had a lot of fun too.
He did!  He loved picking wild strawberries with me.  We also went hiking and fishing.
That sounds like a perfect weekend.  I'm jealous!  I miss going camping.
You should go again sometime soon!  It's always a good time.
I know, I know.  I'll try to plan something soon.
Great!  I'm sure you'll have a great time.
